name: PHVS_DiseaseType_AcuteHepatitisB
title: Disease Type (Acute Hepatitis B)
description: Acute hepatitis B disease type value set has problems or disease related to Acute Hepatitis B. This value set is based upon SNOMED CT

concept.display: Acute fulminating type B viral hepatitis
Acute hepatitis B with delta agent (coinfection) with hepatic coma
Acute hepatitis B with delta-agent (coinfection) without hepatic coma
Acute hepatitis B with hepatic coma
Acute hepatitis B with hepatitis D
